name: BerlinRUG
tagline: Repository for the Berlin R Users Group (BerlinRUG)
body:
# Welcome to the Berlin R Users Group's Repository

Here you can find material being used at our group meetups, presentation slides, tutorial data etc.

Please feel free to [join the group](http://www.meetup.com/Berlin-R-Users-Group/) and come by one of our upcoming events.

## Meetups

### 2015-12-17: Method Comparison Studies (MCS)

[Konstantin Greger: "Welcome Slides"](20151217/berlinrug-6-welcome/index.html) ([@kogreger](https://twitter.com/kogreger))

Kevin O'Brien: Method Comparison Studies with R : A whistlestop tour of methods and techniques for one of the most commonly encountered problems in sciences (University of Limerick, Ireland; [@kobriendublin](https://twitter.com/kobriendublin))

### 2015-11-19: R BeeRs

No presentations, just socializing at [Caf√© Uebereck](http://www.uebereck-berlin.de/index.html)

### 2015-10-29: Product Discovery with R

[Konstantin Greger: "Welcome Slides"](20151029/berlinrug-4-welcome/index.html) ([@kogreger](https://twitter.com/kogreger))

[Eduard Parsadanyan: "[Unfulfilled] Potential of R in Clinical Research"](20151029/unfulfilled-potential-of-r-in-clinical-research/Parsadanyan_R in Clinical Research_fixed.pdf)

### 2015-09-24: R and the Crowd

[Konstantin Greger: "Welcome Slides"](20150924/berlinrug-3-welcome/index.html) ([@kogreger](https://twitter.com/kogreger))

[Open Mic!](http://berlinrug.github.io/BerlinRUG/20150924/open-mic/Open Mic.pdf)

[Michael Rustler: "Creating A Crowd Based Central Knowledge Hub for R"](http://berlinrug.github.io/BerlinRUG/20150924/creating-a-crowd-based-knowledge-hub-for-r/Meetup_BerlinRUG_CrowdBasedRKnowledgeHub.pdf) ([Kompetenzzentrum Wasser Berlin](http://www.kompetenzwasser.de/))

[Tim Vogelsang: "Prototyping with R shiny: Video and Quiz Analysis in MOOCs"](http://de.slideshare.net/TimVogelsang/prototyping-with-r-shiny-video-and-quiz-analysis-in-moocs) ([@TimVogelsang](https://twitter.com/timvogelsang), [iversity.org](http://iversity.org/))

### 2015-07-23: Best of useR! Conference 2015

[Konstantin Greger: "Welcome Slides"](20150723/berlinrug-2-welcome/index.html) ([@kogreger](https://twitter.com/kogreger))

[Rick Scavetta: "Data Vis Highlights"](http://berlinrug.github.io/BerlinRUG/20150723/datavis/DataVis.html) ([@Rick_Scavetta](https://twitter.com/rick_scavetta))

[Konstantin Greger: "Spatial Analysis in R"](http://berlinrug.github.io/BerlinRUG/20150723/spatial-analysis-in-r/Konstantin Greger - Spatial Analysis in R at useR Conference 2015.pdf) ([@kogreger](https://twitter.com/kogreger))

### 2015-06-24: 1. Meetup

[Konstantin Greger: "Welcome and Group Introduction"](20150624/berlinrug-introduction/index.html) ([@kogreger](https://twitter.com/kogreger))

[Berry Boessenkool: "Why you need an umbrella on hot days"](http://berlinrug.github.io/BerlinRUG/20150624/prectemp/Defense_PrecTemp.pdf) ([@berryboessenkoo](https://twitter.com/berryboessenkoo))

[Daniel Kirsch: "Analyzing Children's Relay Times for Fun and Gold Medals"](http://berlinrug.github.io/BerlinRUG/20150624/relays/relays.pdf) ([@kirel](https://twitter.com/kirel))
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
